Profile.paragraph1: As a front-end developer with a background in UX/UI design, I bring a unique perspective to my work. I've spent several years honing my skills as a UX/UI designer, giving me a strong foundation in understanding user needs and creating intuitive interfaces. In 2018, I decided to shift my focus to front-end development, which I've found to be a true passion.
Profile.paragraph2: Over the past few years, I've had the opportunity to work with several companies, from startups to international corporations. My experience has given me the chance to tackle a diverse set of challenges, working closer with the UX and backend teams. I am driven by the need to solve problems, learn new technologies and work in a team.
Profile.paragraph3: Recently, I have also been focusing on blockchain and decentralized applications, learning about solidity and web3 as I go. This new field excites me and I am constantly looking for new opportunities to learn and grow as a professional.

certificate.description: Scratch at the door then walk away wack the mini furry mouse
certificate.name: Backend Developer

Academic.description: A degree in graphic design at School of Arts

experience.jobDescription: Working in frontend of carmine.pt, a expand project for the company - Next.js, Storybook

I worked closely with the UX and Marketing team developing a site generator for the main site of the company. Analyzing the requirements and developing the components for the frontend application using Next.js, and Strapi as headless CMS for the administration.

Transform designs and concepts into working websites, using Twig, HTML, CSS and Javascript. Keep fluent communication with customer-facing teams, work on exactly what a customer needs. Produce and maintain cross-browser, cross-platform, and high-quality code.
